content:
Exactly! You've got a good budget in mind, and you're considering the quality and design of the earrings. That's a great approach.

Since you're looking to match the necklace, you might find earrings that are similarly priced or slightly more expensive, depending on the materials and craftsmanship. Don't be afraid to ask the store staff about the quality of the earrings, the type of gemstone, and the materials used.

Remember, it's not just about the price; it's about finding a pair of earrings that complements the necklace and makes your sister feel special on her birthday.

Good luck with your search, and I hope you find the perfect pair of earrings to complete the gift!
